{"id":945824281,"question_id":2780,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 1 month","timestamp":1683430250,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/945824281/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Make Costs of Paths Equal in a Binary Tree","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public int minIncrements(int n, int[] cost) {\n        \n        int lv = 0;\n        int t = n;\n        while(t!=0){\n            lv++;\n            t/=2;\n        }\n        \n        \n        \n        int cnt = 0;\n       while(lv>0){\n           \n           int max = 0;\n           \n          \n           int st = (int) Math.pow(2, lv-1)-1;\n           int ed = (int) Math.pow(2, lv)-1;\n           \n            // System.out.println(lv + \" \"+ st + \" \" + ed);\n           \n           for(int i=st; i<ed; i++){\n               max =Math.max(max , cost[i]);\n           }\n           \n           for(int i=st; i<ed; i++){\n               cnt += max - cost[i];\n           }\n           \n           \n           lv--;\n           \n       }\n        \n        return cnt;\n        \n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"make-costs-of-paths-equal-in-a-binary-tree","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
